alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 21 at 2:51PM MST until November 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of most intense winds are expected to occur through approximately 9 PM MST this evening.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera
